title: 3 Witches for 3 Wolves: A Paranormal Romance
description: Alpha Eric North has problems. A rogue wolf has attacked his sister and the only thing that can save her is the help of the very thing he hates the most - The Fae.It's unfortunate for him that the witch who can help him is also found to be his true mate. Can he swallow his pride and ask for help before it's too late or will he let his sister die?And just why has a vampire followed his mate to town....?
author: E.A. Turley
